title: Donburi Kazoku (Like Mother Like Daughter)
synopsis: Yukiko is a young wife who is feeling lonely and unsatisfied. Her husband Koichi won’t satisfy her needs, and in fact they sleep on separate beds. To add to her frustration Yukiko finds some pictures on her husband’s cell phone – pictures of an unknown naked woman; also one night she sees her two children – who are not related by blood – together in bed.
